summary: This adds an orc blacksmith to riverwood which can be recruited as a follower and married if wanted.
descriptionHtml:
This adds an orc blacksmith to riverwood which can be recruited as a follower and married if wanted.
She has a daily routine which involves working at the smithy and hanging out in the inn.

She\'s based upon an old character I lost the save off.

[heading][color=yellow]Details[/color][/heading]
Name: Glash
Race: Orc
Hair: Red
Eyes: Yellow/Blind
Voice: Orcish Follower
Location: Riverwood 
Occupation: Blacksmith
Free time: Hanging at the Inn

Primary skills: One-Handed, Heavy Armor
Secondary Skills: Block
Tertiary Skills: Two-Handed, Archery, Smithing, Sneak
Level Range: 5-100
Levels with player: Yes
Essential: Depends on the downloaded file


[heading][color=yellow]Required[/color][/heading]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair - ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_4_Full[/url]


[heading][color=yellow]To attain her looks (not necessary to make it work)[/color][/heading]
*Install in this order
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen - coverwomen look_3[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24318]Barbarian and Milkdrinker Skin UNP and UNPB - Milkdrinker Skin[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24530]High-Res Female Orc Skin[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11371]83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all - Orc Khajiit Argonian Werewolf[/url]

*Note: Pictures made with my own [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24173]ENB configuration[/url].


[heading][color=yellow]Installation[/color][/heading]
Either use NMM to download and install or copy the contents of the zip into your Skyrim/Data folder.
Then activate the ESP either with NMM, the launcher or some other tool.


[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall[/color][/heading]
Deactive the mod with NMM or delete the files
../Skyrim/Data/Follower - Glash.esp
../Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/facegendata/facegeom/Follower - Glash.esp/00010000.NIF
../Skyrim/Data/textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/Follower - Glash.esp/00010000.dds


[heading][color=yellow]Incompatibility[/color][/heading]
None currently known


[heading][color=yellow]Known Bugs[/color][/heading]
None currently known


[heading][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/heading]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating the game and Creation Kit.


[heading][color=yellow]Tools Used[/color][/heading]
Creation Kit - To place her ingame and give her detailed stats.
Skyrim NPC Editor - To create her face and headtint.
TesVEdit - To clean up unwanted edits and other stuff.


[heading][color=yellow]Licensing/Legal[/color][/heading]
You can use the file however you like just remember to give credits where due.
author: ErikRedbeard
